title: Revenge......?
detail_text: <:th_ch0007/>Hey, hey, Karin-chan, I want to see how you walk 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Huh? Right now? I thought you had already mastered it when I first taught you how to do it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Hmm, but I already forgot all of it. Pretty please!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>I guess it can’t be helped. Sure. Let’s see......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>I see, I see. I did remember one thing correctly. I don’t put enough straightness into my spine, which makes it not look like I’m being suspended from above......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Whaaaat!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>You’re always able to do it perfectly 𝅘𝅥𝅮<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Nozomi-chan...... You just wanted me to do it......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0007/>Fufu, that’s not true. Now that I’ve seen a great example, I’ll do it too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0204/>Oh, come on! I’m gonna grade you strictly, you know!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
